response.original_title: Gracie Abrams: Live at Lollapalooza Berlin 2025
response.overview: Recorded live at Lollapalooza, in Berlin, on July 12th 2025. The American singer-songwriter rose to fame with her introspective bedroom pop songs, which often feel like diary entriesâ€”intimate, honest, and heartbreakingly beautiful.  Setlist: "Risk", "Blowing Smoke", "21", "I Love You, I'm Sorry", "Where Do We Go Now?", "I Told You Things", "Mess It Up", "Let It Happen", "Death Wish", "I Miss You, I'm Sorry", "Free Now", "That's So True", "Close to You"
response.title: Gracie Abrams: Live at Lollapalooza Berlin 2025
